dt-api.name: fixedHeader.disable()

type.description: Disable the fixed elements. When disabled, the table will remain static, regardless of end user scrolling.

dt-api.description: This method can be used to disable the table's fixed elements (i.e. header and footer). This can be useful if you wish to show and hide the table (see also `fh-api fixedHeader.adjust()`) or otherwise manipulate the table in its original state.
